contentrichtext.text: Vanity. [[User:Ludraman|L<small>UDRAMAN</small>]] | [[User talk:Ludraman|T]] 21:01, 1 Apr 2004 (UTC) * Possible copyvio from [http://www.lambiek.net/williams_r.htm] -- [[User:Cyrius|Cyrius]] | [[User talk:Cyrius|Talk]] 23:10, Apr 1, 2004 (UTC) * Seems like a vanity page--it either needs to be redone or removed. [[User:Bkalafut|Bkalafut]] 05:48, 6 Apr 2004 (UTC) *Delete - vanity - [[User:Texture|Tεx]][[User Talk:Texture|<font color=red>τ</font>]][[User:Texture|urε]] 21:25, 8 Apr 2004 (UTC) *Delete. It's a copyvio as noted by Cyrius above. Same anonymous user also copied [[S. Clay Wilson]] from [http://www.lambiek.net/wilson.htm]. I've posted Wilson on the [[copyvio]] list. I'd do likewise with Williams but it looks like VfD will take care of it. [[User:Wile E. Heresiarch|Wile E. Heresiarch]] 23:06, 8 Apr 2004 (UTC) *I suggest redirecting to [[Robbie Williams]] until a more famous one comes along. -- [[User:Francs2000|Graham :)]] | [[User talk:Francs2000|Talk]] 23:11, 8 Apr 2004 (UTC)
